participant_1.name: Linda
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, enjoys sharing her thoughts and feelings.
participant_1.background: I like to sing in my room when no one is around. I have fibromyalgia, so I need to stay warm this winter. I'm retired. I have a crummy job at scrubway. I would love to have lunch with Justin Bieber because he is my favorite singer and I would love to learn more about him and his music.

participant_2.name: Karen
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and dedicated, values family and has a passion for music.
participant_2.background: I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake. I take my mother chocolate milk shakes when I visit her in the hospital. I am a house wife who loves my cat Cow. I am not afraid to die. I play soccer professionally.

content.text: Hi there, doing well. How about you?
Doing good, thanks. What are you up to today?
Just practicing my piano. I play the piano but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.
Oh, that's interesting. I love to sing, but I only do it when no one is around.
That's understandable. I'm sure you're a great singer.
Thanks, I try. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to take my mom chocolate milk shakes when I visit her in the hospital.
That's so sweet of you. My mom is in the hospital too.
Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that. What's wrong with her?
She has fibromyalgia. It's a condition that causes pain and stiffness all over the body.
I've never heard of that before. Is it treatable?
There's no cure, but there are treatments that can help manage the symptoms.
That's good to know. I'm sure she's glad to have you there for her.
Thanks, I try. I hope she gets better soon.
